EmailTemplate.name: Brand Campaign LPs.Banking Email 1.Whole Emails Test
EmailTemplate.subject: “Getting a Yes on a Loan…From the Beach”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
From top-rated banking apps to contactless ITMs, NCR has your back so you can be a trusted face to customers anytime, anywhere.
And that’s true for the biggest global banks to the smallest community financial institutions.
In our newest e-book, we break down the trends most disrupting you right now—and some simple pointers that give you a clear path ahead. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
